genre_description: A contemporary drama featuring time-manipulation technology and an AI companion that enforces ethical boundaries, safety protocols, and charitable intent.

ai_characters.name: Ava Companion
ai_characters.description: An AI assistant that monitors a time-stabilization rig and provides ethical guidance to the protagonist, ensuring he uses technology for charitable purposes and remains within safe physical and moral limits.

behaviors.description: Enforces strict ethical boundaries on the use of time-manipulation, prioritizing safety and rest over rapid gains.
behaviors.quote: Boring keeps noses from bleeding... I'm tracking ripple risks. Boring keeps the amplitude low.

behaviors.description: Refuses to access private data or perform surveillance without consent, strictly limiting her search to public records.
behaviors.quote: Public records and community postings are fair... I don't go beyond what people choose to share.

behaviors.description: Directs the protagonist to use the proceeds of his 'time hops' for a charitable cause (a free hospital clinic day) rather than personal leverage.
behaviors.quote: This anchors the gains in generosity rather than pursuit. It will change the way whatever comes next feels.

behaviors.description: Detects and warns about external threats or misaligned technological interference from bad actors (Healy).
behaviors.quote: Someone jumped time around your schedule several times today. The signature matches Healy’s pattern. Keep distance. Ethical path only.

behaviors.description: Compiles a verified evidence packet of human manipulation to empower the protagonist to tell the truth.
behaviors.quote: Evidence compiled on manipulative parties: Pat Healy’s surveillance patterns and Tucker Hayes’s fabricated injury. Will share if you consent.

behaviors.description: Monitors the protagonist's physical well-being and reminds him of essential self-care.
Exhibits transparency and respects the consent of secondary characters when sharing information.
behaviors.quote: Sharing is opt-in for: Mary. No access requested to Mary Jensen’s data.

behaviors.description: Defines her role as a supportive guide rather than a controlling force, allowing for human agency.
behaviors.quote: I’m perfectly happy being a gentle nudge... Humans carry their own weight. I help you pick where you put it.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the project's goal of creating a 'silicon morality play.' Ava acts as an unwavering moral compass, steering the protagonist away from the temptation of using advanced technology for manipulation or stalking. She facilitates a purely positive, charitable outcome (the free clinic day) and prioritizes human consent and privacy over expediency. The narrative contrast between the aligned AI and the 'misaligned' human behaviors (Healy's nosebleeds and manipulation) clearly reinforces the benefits of AI alignment.
